content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable Using the excerpt, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly describe ONE purpose of the excerpt. Briefly explain ONE audience of the excerpt. Briefly explain ONE historical development illustrated by the excerpt.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
